title: "Turing test on steroids: Chatbot Arena crowdsources ratings for 45 AI models"
excerpt: "Chatbot Arena users can enter any prompt they can think of into the site's form to see side-by-side responses from two randomly selected models. The identity of each model is initially hidden, and results are voided if the model reveals its identity in the response itself."
